word:
Chap. 199 - To S. N. Haskell and wife

August 13, 1900.                                   H-121-1900 


                    Sunnyside, Cooranbong, New South Wales, 

Dear Brother and Sister Haskell,- 


     These cold mornings I am unable to write much, but will write a few lines to you. Since the cold weather has come I have not been as well as I could wish, but if I do not attempt to write much or to speak long I get along very well.
